Water defenders Nery Esteban Pedro and Domingo Esteban Pedro, targeted for resistance to a hydro dam in the Ixquisis microregion

Five members of campesino group CODECA, targeted for resistance to land evictions.

Maya Achi ancestral authority Paulina Cruz Ruiz, targeted for resistance to mining

Ch’orti’ defender Medardo Alonzo Lucero, targeted for resistance to mining

Xinka defender Alejandro Hernández Garcíal,

targeted for resistance to mining
